dataList.lowMoraleDescription:
Gain 1 additional [Smoke] or [Smoke] Count when gaining them.
Turn Start: gain 3 [Vulnerable], 2 [AttackDmgUp], and 1 [Endurance].
dataList.panicDescription:
Gain 2 additional [Smoke] or [Smoke] Count when gaining them.
Turn Start: gain 3 [Vulnerable], 4 [AttackDmgUp], and 2 [Endurance].
